name: Goblin Gauntlet
description: My junior year of high school I wanted to start making games but my only programming experience was from making a Minecraft mod. Not letting this stop me, I spent countless hours watching tutorials and over time learned Java. I watched many more tutorials that helped me build a working rudimentary game engine. From there I used my imagination and Stack Overflow to add features to my game until it became a full product. I recruited an artistic friend of mine to create all the assets for the game and eventually Goblin Gauntlet was the result.
